mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID , USER_NAME , PWD , PWD_HINT , PWD_ANSWER , TRY_CNT , RGST_DATE FROM USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT QNA.QST_SEQ , QNA.CUST_ID , ISNULL(CUS.CUST_NAME, QNA.CUST_NAME) AS CUST_NAME , QNA.TITLE , QNA.MEMO , QNA.USER_ID , USR.USER_NAME , QNA.CHRG_DATE , QNA.ANSWER , QNA.ANSWER_DATE , QNA.RGST_DATE , CASE WHEN ISNULL(QNA.USER_ID, '') = '' THEN '00' WHEN ISNULL(QNA.USER_ID, '') <> '' AND ISNULL(QNA.ANSWER_DATE, '') = '' THEN '01' ELSE '02' END AS STATE_CD , CASE WHEN ISNULL(QNA.USER_ID, '') = '' THEN '배정대기' WHEN ISNULL(QNA.USER_ID, '') <> '' AND ISNULL(QNA.ANSWER_DATE, '') = '' THEN '답변대기' ELSE '답변완료' END AS STATE_NAME FROM QUESTION_ANSWER QNA LEFT OUTER JOIN CUSTOMER CUS ON CUS.CUST_ID = QNA.CUST_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USER USR ON QNA.USER_ID = USR.USER_ID WHERE QNA.USER_ID = #{userId} AND ( (QNA.ANSWER_DATE IS NULL OR QNA.ANSWER_DATE = '') OR QNA.RGST_DATE LIKE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyyMMdd') || '%' ) ORDER BY QNA.ANSWER_DATE NULLS FIRST, QNA.QST_SEQ ASC

SELECT COUNT(QNA.QST_SEQ) AS TOT_CNT , ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN ISNULL(QNA.ANSWER_DATE, '') <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS ANS_CNT , ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN ISNULL(QNA.ANSWER_DATE, '') = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS NO_ANS_CNT FROM QUESTION_ANSWER QNA LEFT OUTER JOIN CUSTOMER CUS ON CUS.CUST_ID = QNA.CUST_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USER USR ON QNA.USER_ID = USR.USER_ID WHERE QNA.USER_ID = #{userId} AND ( (ISNULL(QNA.ANSWER_DATE, '') = '') OR QNA.RGST_DATE LIKE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyyMMdd') || '%' )
